General.Name: Public Joint Stock Company Moscow City Telephone Network
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Moscow City Telephone Network provides telecommunications services in Russia and rest of Europe. The company offers internet, television, home phone, and mobile connection services. It also provides CCTV, security, antivirus, smart house, smart phones and gadgets, and various home services. The company was founded in 1882 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
